data.prayer: Father, help the 12,948 believers in Csongrád to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Csongrád, Hungary
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Csongrád. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Csongrád to agree with you and with one another.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Csongrád, Hungary to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Lord, make the 12,948 believers in Csongrád to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 410,852 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Csongrád, Hungary to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 410,852 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the state of Csongrád, Hungary has a population of 423,800.

We estimate Csongrád has 12,948 people who might know Jesus, 355,902 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 54,950 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 12,948 believers in the state of Csongrád to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
